full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement for Fabric

**Title**
 English: 21C31-234013 Request for Standing Offer for Fabrics
French: 21C31-234013 Demande d'offre à commandes pour Tissus

**Reference Number**
WS4221634830-Doc4253990386

**Solicitation Number**
WS4221634830

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Procurement Overview**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids for the procurement of fabrics for winter parkas to be manufactured for inmates by Correctional Service of Canada / Corcan.

**Required Quantities**

- Utility twill fabric in forest green color: 35,000 meters
- Lining fabric: 20,000 meters

**Estimated Extensions**

- Utility twill fabric in forest green color: 35,000 meters
- Lining fabric: 20,000 meters

**Terms**
- Canadian content policy: This procurement is conditionally limited to Canadian goods.

**Offset Information**

The offset partner will be accountable for all goods received and will be responsible for meeting the requirements of the contract.

**Contact Information**

- Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
  - Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
  - Contact: Darya Kritova (SPAC/PSPC)
    - Email: [darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darya.kritova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**

- Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Regions of Opportunity: Canada
- Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Notice URL**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17691190?extsite=MTc2OTExOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The bidding process is now closed. The offset partner of the successful bidder will be accountable for all goods received and will be responsible for meeting the requirements of the contract. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to modify, cancel or suspend the procurement at any time. The offset partner is expected to provide their goods within the given timeframe. Note that the procurement categories and requirements may be subject to change according to the PSPC policies and rules.
